title: Hotels
content: We have a hotel block at the same venue as our reception, the Chicago Marriot Schaumburg.
You can book a room in our block using this link.
Rooms are $119/night and you can book anytime between now and Monday, September 18th.
If you trouble with availability of rooms, reach out and we can get the hotel to add more rooms to the block.

title: Flying
content: We recommend flying into Chicago O'Hare.
The hotel does not have an airport shuttle, but it is only a 20 minute ride from O'Hare.

title: Getting Around
content: We expect to have a shuttle between the church and hotel.
There are several car rentals services available at the airport and nearby the hotel.
